name: HoppyDays
description:
First thing is first this game is built on Godot 3.2 and was made following course work on udemy from gamedev.tv However I do plan on extending the game a little over time. More levels. Maybe additional power ups and so on. 

Controls: 
  • Movement
    • A and D move left and right
    • W and Space jumps 
Gameplay: 
  • Collect coins to increase your lives.
    • 5 coins = one life | Realistically its more of an HP ticker.
  • Avoid spikes and spikemen one hit is one life.

Graphic Assets created by kenney.nl
